{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=4G300 |revision= |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=common |type=3G mobile router |fcc_date=03/21/2014 |fcc_id=V7T4G300 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q32BSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWPA-25H |expansion_if_types=USB |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=battery powered, support 3G/4G modem |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink v4.1.1.0; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.34; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Tenda_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Tenda_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless N300 3G/4G Router}} :''w/ 2600mAh Mobile Power Bank''

===Serial port=== :TP10/TP11 (RX/TX)
